variantrule.name: Tension Pool
entries: The tension pool is a collection of {@dice d6cs=1;2d6cs=1;3d6cs=1;4d6cs=1;5d6cs=1;6d6cs=1|up to 6d6} dice. Here are the actions you can take with the pool:

items: Add a {@dice d6cs=1|d6} and roll the pool

entries: If you roll a 1 on any of the {@dice d6}, something bad happens.
